text: kya tum ne unhe nahi dekha jinhe hukm kiya gaya tha ke apne haatho ko roke rakho aur namaaze padte raho aur zakaath ada karte raho,phir jab unhe jihaad ka hukm diya gaya to osi waqt un ki ek jamaath logo se is qadar darne lagi jaise Allah taâ€™ala ka dar ho, balke us se bhi zyaada,aur kehne lage aye hamaare rab! tu ne hum par jihaad kyo farz kar diya? kyo hamein thodi si zindagi aur na jine di? aap keh dijiye ke dunya ki soodh-mandhi 13 to bahuth hee kam hai aur parhezgaaro ke liye to aaqirath hee behtar hai,aur tum par ek dhaage ke baraabar bhi sitam rawa na rakha jayega
